mapper.select: SELECT DU.NAME AS '의사이름', A.AGENCYNAME AS '병원이름', A.AGENCYTEL AS '병원번호', D.DANSREQTIME AS '진료시간', D.DANSCONTENT AS '증상', DF.DANSFILENAME AS '파일명', DF.DANSFILEORINAME AS '원본명' FROM DIAGNOSIS D LEFT JOIN DANSFILE DF ON D.DANSNUM = DF.DANSNUM LEFT JOIN USERS DU ON D.DOCTORNAME = DU.USERNAME LEFT JOIN MEDIC M ON D.DOCTORNAME = M.USERNAME LEFT JOIN AGENCY A ON M.AGENCYNUM = A.AGENCYNUM WHERE D.USERNAME = #{username}
